string-array.name: help_texts
string-array.item: When exporting, a copy of the current database (file with .cdb extension) is created in the "Exported Databases" folder. The file is an archive with a database and images, so the export speed is low.

To import the new-format database, select the .cdb database file on the device. When importing, the old database will be deleted! \n To import the old-format database, select the .db database file on the device. To import images there a folder with images must exist in the same folder as the database. Images folder and database file must have the same name. For example, \"124576.db\" and \"124576\". When importing, the old database will be deleted!
To delete a category, tap on it and hold until the delete dialog opens. To delete a banknote, open its full view and tap on the delete icon.
To swap the objects in the list, click the move icon. After that, click&hold on the object you want to move and then drag it to a new location. To save changes, click \"Back\" or \"Done\".
With the \"Automatic backup\" option enabled, the database will be automatically saved to the \"Exported Databases\" folder when entering new categories/banknotes list screen.
